about_the_game:
30-days access to more basic air/ground/sea content!


The Starter Account is subscription-based and has been introduced as a more affordable option to discover the game and gain your first ranks!

Additionally to all f2p units, the STARTER subscription grants you access to these extra units (rank restrictions may apply):

STARTER SUBSCRIPTION EQUIPMENT LIST:
NOTE: All US Army equipment enters in Tier 3

INFANTRY


Rifle (includes paratrooper class)
  • Mas 36
  • Enfield No.4 Mk I
  • M1903A3 Springfield
  • K-98
  • Modello 1891 (IT)

Rifle, Anti-tank
  • Boys ATR
  • Pzb 39 ATR

Grenadier
  • Lebel 1886/M93
  • Enfield No.4 Mk I
  • K-98

Mortarman (includes paratrooper class)
  • M37 50mm
  • SBML 2 inch
  • Granatwerfer 36

SMG (includes paratrooper class)
  • Mas 38
  • M1928 Thompson
  • M1A1 Thompson
  • MP40

SMG (reserve)
  • M3A1 Grease Gun
  • Sten Mk II
  • M3A1 Grease Gun
  • Modello 38 (IT)

LMG (includes paratrooper class)
  • FM 24/29
  • Bren Mk I
  • M1919A6
  • MG-34

Semi-Autos
  • Mas 40
  • M1 Garand
  • M1 Carbine
  • G41

Engineer
  • Mas 36
  • Enfield No.4 Mk I
  • M1903A3 Springfield
  • K-98

Sapper
  • M-1935
  • Webley
  • M1911
  • Luger

Engineer, Combat (includes paratrooper class)
  • Mas 36
  • Enfield No.4 Mk I
  • M1 Garand
  • K-98

GUNS (AT/AA)


Anti-air gun (light)
  • mle 1938 AA
  • 25mm AA
  • mle 1938 AA
  • Flak 30 AA

Anti-air, Truck
  • Laffly Truck CA mle 1938 AA
  • Bedford 25mm AA
  • Opel Flak30 20mm

Anti-tank gun (light)
  • mle 1934 AT Gun
  • 2lb AT Gun
  • M3 37mm AT Gun
  • Pak36 AT Gun

Anti-tank Gun
  • mle 1937 47mm gun
  • 6lb gun
  • 57mm gun
  • Pak38

Anti-tank, Mechanized
  • Lorraine 37L Anti-Char
  • M3 Gun Motor Carriage 75mm
  • Sd Kfz 251/10 37mm Anti-Tank

ARMORED


Car, Armored
  • Panhard AMD 178
  • Daimler Mk I
  • Sd Kfz 231

Armor, Light
  • R-35
  • Vickers Mk Vib
  • Panzer IIC

Armor, Medium
  • H-39
  • A13 Cruiser Mk II
  • Pz 38(t)
  • M3A3
  • Panzer III (H)
  • M4A2
  • Churchill Mk III
  • Panzer IV (G)

TRUCKS/HAULERS


Hauler, Light (light spawn)
  • Laffly S-20
  • Beford OY Truck
  • 2.5 Ton GMC CCKW
  • Opel

Hauler, Light Tow (heavy spawn)
  • Lorraine 37L Half-Track
  • Universal Carrier Mk II
  • M3 Half-Track
  • Sd Kfz 251/C, 251/D

Hauler, Heavy Tow (light spawn)
  • Laffly S-20)
  • Morris CDSW Gun Tractor
  • 2.5 Ton GMC CCKW
  • Sd Kfz 7 Half-Track

Hauler, Supply Only (ammo, fuel, mobile airfield, barrage balloon)
  • Laffly S-20 Supply
  • Bedford OY Supply Truck
  • 2.5 Ton GMC CCKW Supply
  • Opel Supply

AIRCRAFT

  • Bf 109E-1
  • Bf 109E-4
  • Bf 110C-4
  • Hurricane Mk I
  • Spitfire Mk 1a
  • Hawk H75A-3
  • Dewotine D.520
  • P40B / Curtiss Hawk H81A-2
  • Bf 110C-4 OR 110F-B (F/B, JABO)
  • 109E4B (F/B, JABO)
  • Kittyhawk II F/B OR P40F (F/B, JABO)
  • Hurricane Mk IIB (F/B, JABO)
  • Blen Mk I
  • Blen Mk IV (Bomber)
  • Ju87B Stuka
  • Junkers Ju 52 3M
  • Douglas Dakota (C 47)

SEA

  • Fairmile B Motor Launch (all factions)

You share the same early-war supplies as premium players. When campaigns reach higher tiers (1941, 1942, 1943, 1944, and 1945) you will need more teamwork and better tactics to face more modern weapons. The complete experience of World War II Online will require you to upgrade to a Premium Account.

This level of access will allow you to focus on roleplay and play in any of the 10 personas available in-game and rank each of these up to Lt. Colonel (or the branch/country equivalent), i.e. rank 13.

Remember supplies are limited per spawn point (resupply takes multiple hours). Weapons may therefore not always be available during a battle.
Similarly to free accounts, starter accounts receive free access to all units during campaign intermissions.

ATTENTION: This sale is renewed monthly by default (subscription model), you can cancel it anytime (see STEAM conditions).

Any issues with your subscription? Submit a Support Ticket here -

The Starter Account is subscription-based and has been introduced as a more affordable option to discover the game and gain your first ranks!

Additionally to all f2p units, the STARTER subscription grants you access to these extra units (rank restrictions may apply):

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

name: World War II Online - STARTER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

short_description: Ready to play a greater role? Start a true WWII Online Career! Base level access to the game world in every country and branch, unlocking access to all units & features from our DLC packs (as a few more)!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
